item.title: WhatsApp Web to get 'Reverse Image Search' feature to curb misinformation - CNBCTV18
item.description:
WhatsApp Web Introduces 'Reverse Image Search'

Publication Date: March 2024 | Source: CNBC TV18

WhatsApp Web is set to roll out a new reverse image search feature designed to help users verify the authenticity of photos and combat the spread of misinformation.

  • The new feature allows users to upload photos for verification through Google.
  • This tool aims to identify manipulated or out-of-context images.
  • Access is through the overflow menu in the image viewing interface.
  • WhatsApp reassures that it will not access the content of the uploaded images.
  • The aim is to empower users to make informed decisions regarding the content they share and receive.
“By integrating this feature, WhatsApp aims to empower users to make informed decisions about the content they share and receive, especially in cases where misinformation or manipulated media might be a concern.”

This new feature marks a significant step towards equipping users with tools to verify shared content and protect themselves from misinformation.

item.title: Apple could bring its ‘Pro’ OLED displays to the entire iPhone 17 line - The Verge
item.description:
Apple could bring its ‘Pro’ OLED displays to the entire iPhone 17 line

Date: December 30, 2024 Source: MacRumors

According to a leak from Digital Chat Station, Apple may equip its entire iPhone 17 lineup with high-refresh-rate OLED displays, a feature currently exclusive to the ‘Pro’ models.

  • The base iPhone 17 is rumored to feature a high refresh rate display as per leaks.
  • Previous accurate leaks from Digital Chat Station regarding iPhone components boost confidence in the rumor.
  • Apple is expected to use the same LTPO panel technology used in the iPhone 16 Pro across all models.
  • Future models may include an iPhone 17 “Slim” replacing the current base model.
  • The entire lineup is anticipated to feature 24MP front-facing cameras and a new Apple-designed Wi-Fi/Bluetooth chip.
“Instead of differentiating by display tech, Apple could stratify the lineup in different ways.”

This potential shift may mark a significant transformation in how Apple markets its iPhone lineup, making advanced display technology more accessible to all users.

item.title: WhatsApp Integrates Google Reverse Image Search to Combat Misinformation - Mobile ID World
item.description:
WhatsApp Integrates Google Reverse Image Search to Combat Misinformation

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Various sources

WhatsApp has added a new reverse image search capability to its messaging platform, enhancing its security tools. Users can now verify the authenticity of images directly within WhatsApp, using Google's image search technology.

  • Users tap an image and select “Search on the web” to verify authenticity.
  • The feature preserves user privacy by not storing uploaded images on WhatsApp servers.
  • This capability is currently in testing and aims to counter misinformation by identifying original sources of images.
  • It enhances existing security features and will be available for all users soon.
“The reverse image search capability enhances existing WhatsApp security features, providing users with integrated tools to assess the authenticity of received media.”

This new feature is a significant step towards combating misinformation and helping users make informed decisions about content sharing.

item.title: Spotify’s search results are exposing users to adult content, what the company has to say - The Times of India
item.description:
Spotify’s Search Results Exposing Users to Adult Content: Company Response

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: Unknown

Spotify is facing criticism as its search results inadvertently expose users to adult content. The company has issued a statement addressing the concerns raised by users about this issue.

  • Users have reported that searching for certain songs or artists returned results that included explicit content.
  • Spotify's content filtering mechanisms are being scrutinized as the company works to enhance user safety.
  • The company reassured users that it is actively investigating the situation.
“We take these matters seriously and are committed to ensuring a safe listening experience for all our users.” - Spotify Representative

In conclusion, Spotify acknowledges the issue and is working towards a solution to improve its content filtering to prevent adult content exposure in search results.

item.description:
It’s the most indispensable machine in the world—and it depends on this woman

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Mint

Brienna Hall has a critical role at ASML, a company that many may not be familiar with, yet it plays an essential part in the technology landscape.

  • Brienna Hall works as a customer-support engineer at ASML, a key company in the semiconductor industry.
  • Her role is crucial yet often goes unnoticed, highlighting the importance of support roles in high-tech industries.

item.title: OnePlus 13 coming to India soon, it brings Project Starlight, lifetime display warranty & AI features with it - India Today
item.description:
OnePlus 13 coming to India soon, it brings Project Starlight, lifetime display warranty & AI features with it

Published On: Dec 30, 2024 By: Ankita Garg

The OnePlus 13 series, including the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R, will launch in India on January 7, featuring OxygenOS 15 with AI capabilities and a lifetime display warranty.

Key Points:

  • Launch date: January 7, 2025.
  • Incorporates OxygenOS 15 focused on AI for enhanced productivity.
  • Lifetime display warranty covering defects for the device's lifespan.
  • Project Starlight aims to address India-specific issues with advanced display technology.
  • Expected to feature Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and improved hardware.
OnePlus is going to offer a lifetime display warranty on all its smartphone models.

Overall, the OnePlus 13 series is set to attract attention with its combination of AI features and robust warranty offerings.

item.title: OnePlus 13 coming to India soon, it brings Project Starlight, lifetime display warranty and AI smarts with it - India Today
item.description:
OnePlus 13 Series Launching Soon in India with AI Smarts, Lifetime Display Warranty, and More

Date & Source: Published on Dec 30, 2024 by Ankita Garg

Get ready for the upcoming OnePlus 13 series, including the OnePlus 13 and the OnePlus 13R, set to launch in India on January 7, 2025. These flagships bring a host of exciting features like OxygenOS 15 AI features, a lifetime display warranty, and top-quality hardware.

  • OxygenOS 15 with AI smarts, including Intelligent Search, AI Detail Boost, AI Unblur, and AI Reflection Eraser
  • Lifetime display warranty, covering industry-wide issues like the green line display problem
  • Project Starlight features, including the world's first DisplayMate A++ display on a flagship phone
  • Flagship hardware, including the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, 12-16GB RAM, and a versatile camera system tuned in collaboration with Hasselblad
OnePlus is offering a lifetime display warranty on the OnePlus 13 series, setting it apart from competitors.

The Indian version of the OnePlus 13R is expected to come with an improved camera setup compared to its Chinese counterpart. Stay tuned for more details on January 7, 2025.

item.title: Onitsuka Tiger considering India as manufacturing hub for regional growth | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Onitsuka Tiger Considering India as Manufacturing Hub for Regional Growth

Publication Date: N/A Source: Mint

Japanese footwear brand Onitsuka Tiger, part of Asics Corporation, is contemplating India as a potential manufacturing hub to hasten its growth in the region.

“Establishing a manufacturing base in India is a strategic move that can significantly accelerate Onitsuka Tiger’s growth in the region. India’s market potential for premium footwear and apparel is growing rapidly, and setting up local manufacturing will add value,” Ryoji Shoda, vice-president of Onitsuka Tiger.
  • Onitsuka Tiger aims to enhance regional growth through local manufacturing in India.
  • The vice-president noted the rapid growth of India's premium footwear and apparel market.
  • A strategic manufacturing base in India could add significant value to the brand.

The potential establishment of a manufacturing hub in India reflects Onitsuka Tiger's commitment to tapping into one of the fastest-growing markets for premium goods in Asia.

item.title: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella meets Telangana CM Revanth Reddy in Hyderabad | Watch | Today News - Mint
item.description:
Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella meets Telangana CM Revanth Reddy in Hyderabad

Publication Date: December 30, 2023
Source: ANI

The Chief Minister of Telangana, Revanth Reddy, welcomed Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella in Hyderabad to discuss the city's development in the technology sector.

  • Reddy welcomed Nadella with a traditional shawl and a memento.
  • The meeting focused on establishing Hyderabad as a leading city in technology.
  • Discussions included Telangana's emphasis on AI, Gen AI, and cloud technology.
  • Nadella acknowledged the importance of enhancing skills and infrastructure.
  • Microsoft has a workforce of 10,000 in Hyderabad and has invested in data center capacity.
Nadella stated that skills and infrastructure are key factors for economic growth in Hyderabad.

The meeting also included other government officials, emphasizing the collaborative effort to grow Telangana's tech landscape.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 Price Leaked Ahead of Launch - Deccan Chronicle
item.description:
Apple iPhone SE 4 Price Leak: $500 Before Launch

Published on: March 2025, Source: Naver

The upcoming iPhone SE 4 or iPhone 16e has had its pricing leaked ahead of launch, with reports suggesting a $500 (Rs 42,743) price tag. The iPhone SE 3 was priced at $429 in the US and Rs 47,600 in India, indicating a price increase for the iPhone SE 4.

  1. Price Drop due to Apple's Own Modem: Apple is using its own modem in the iPhone SE 4, moving away from Qualcomm's modems, which may contribute to the price reduction.
  2. Expected Features:
    • 6.1-inch display, up from the 4.7-inch display of the iPhone SE 3.
    • Single 48MP camera, an upgrade from the 12MP camera in the iPhone SE 3.
    • OLED display, a step up from the LCD display in the previous iPhone SE models.
    • 3279 mAh battery, the same capacity as the iPhone 14.
    • A18 chipset.
    • 8GB of RAM.
    • USB-C port.
iPhone SE 4/iPhone 16e is expected to launch in March 2025.

The iPhone SE 4/iPhone 16e is anticipated to be a significant upgrade from its predecessor, offering improved features at a competitive price point.

item.title: Apple stops selling budget-friendly iPhone SE, iPhone 14 in these countries, citing charger law - The Financial Express
item.description:
Apple Discontinues iPhone SE and iPhone 14 Sales in 29 Countries Due to Charger Regulations

Publication Date: Date not specified
Source: Financial Express

Apple has stopped selling the iPhone SE and iPhone 14 in 29 countries as a response to new European Union regulations mandating a single charging port.

  • The iPhone SE was a popular, budget-friendly option for many customers.
  • The removal affects multiple regions, limiting access to affordable iPhones.
  • Consumers may now need to consider the more expensive iPhone 15 models.
  • This decision is likely to frustrate students and budget-conscious buyers.
“This move is likely to lead to frustration among those seeking affordable iPhones.”

The discontinuation of these models highlights Apple's shift in product strategy, leaving fewer affordable options for consumers.

item.title: iPhone 16, iPhone 16 Pro Max, MacBook Air Get Discounts During Vijay Sales’ Apple Days Sale - Gadgets 360
item.description:
iPhone 16 Series Get Discounts During Vijay Sales’ Apple Days Sale

Publication Date: December 29, 2023Source: Gadgets 360

The iPhone 16 and iPhone 15 series are currently available at discounted prices through Vijay Sales as part of their Apple Days sale, running until January 5, 2025, which also includes discounts on other Apple products.

  • The iPhone 16 is now priced at Rs. 66,900, down from Rs. 79,900.
  • The iPhone 16 Plus is available for Rs. 75,490, reduced from Rs. 89,900.
  • The iPhone 16 Pro costs Rs. 1,03,900, down from Rs. 1,19,000.
  • The iPhone 16 Pro Max is priced at Rs. 1,27,650, compared to Rs. 1,44,900.
  • The iPhone 15 (128GB) is discounted to Rs. 57,490, reduced from Rs. 79,900.
  • Other Apple products like the iPad and MacBook Air are also significantly discounted.
“Vijay Sales is offering up to Rs. 10,000 cashback for customers purchasing Apple devices using select bank cards.”

The Apple Days sale by Vijay Sales offers a substantial opportunity for customers to purchase Apple products at significantly lower prices, along with additional bank-related discounts.

item.title: What is behind Apple’s ‘allergy’ to the world’s biggest and most successful AI chip company Nvidia - The Times of India
item.description:
What is behind Apple’s ‘allergy’ to the world’s biggest and most successful AI chip company Nvidia

Publication Date: [date not provided]Source: [source not provided]

This article explores the complicated relationship between Apple and Nvidia, focusing on Apple's resistance to adopting Nvidia’s AI chip technology despite its market dominance.

  • Nvidia is the leading company in AI chip technology.
  • Apple has historically avoided utilizing Nvidia’s products.
  • The article delves into potential reasons behind Apple's cautious stance.
  • It discusses implications for Apple's product development and innovation.
“Apple’s reluctance to embrace Nvidia chips raises questions about its future AI capabilities.”

In conclusion, the tension between Apple's strategic choices and Nvidia’s technological advancements could shape future market dynamics in AI technology.

item.title: OnePlus 13, Samsung Galaxy S25 And More: Big Phone Launches Coming In January 2025 - News18
item.description:
OnePlus 13, Samsung Galaxy S25 And More: Big Phone Launches Coming In January 2025

Date: December 30, 2024

Source: News18

The tech world is gearing up for a series of significant smartphone launches in January 2025, including offerings from OnePlus, Samsung, and Xiaomi.

Key Launches to Expect:

  • OnePlus 13: Launching on January 7, featuring an upgraded design and specifications including an X2 OLED display and Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • Xiaomi Pad 7 and Redmi 14C: Affordable 5G device expected to support dual-SIM networks and a 50MP camera.
  • Samsung Galaxy S25 Series: Set to introduce flagship models in the competitive premium market.
  • Poco X7 Series: Launching on January 9, focusing on performance and value.
"The OnePlus 13 looks less-curvier thanks to the flat frame, providing a modern aesthetic along with upgraded features such as an IP69 rating for water resistance."

As the new year arrives, tech enthusiasts are anticipating these exciting advancements in smartphone technology.

item.title: Poco X7 Series India Launch Date Set For January 9; Flipkart Availability Confirmed - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Poco X7 Series Launch in India Confirmed for January 9

Date & Source: January 9, 2024, Gadgets 360

Poco X7 series will launch in India on January 9 at 5:30pm IST, according to an X post by the company. The promotional poster confirms that the upcoming smartphones will be available for purchase in the country via Flipkart.

  • The base Poco X7 is expected to arrive alongside a Pro variant.
  • The base version will likely get a MediaTek Dimensity 7300-Ultra chipset, and the Pro variant is said to get a MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC.
  • Poco India Head Himanshu Tandon confirmed that there will not be a 'Neo' variant in the lineup.
According to a leak, the base Poco X7 could sport a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with 1.5K resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.

Related Stories:

  • Poco X7 Pro 5G Global Variant Design Renders, Key Specifications Leaked; Said to Get 6,000mAh Battery
  • Poco X7 5G Design Renders, Colour Options, Key Features Surface Online
  • Poco X7 Global Variant Spotted on Geekbench With Support For 12GB RAM

item.title: POCO M7 Pro 5G Review: Hits all the right notes - CNBCTV18
item.description:
POCO M7 Pro 5G Review: Hits all the right notes

Date & Source: March 2024, CNBC TV18


Introduction: The POCO M7 Pro 5G offers a premium design, immersive display, solid performance, and excellent battery life at an affordable price.

  1. Design: Robust build with a two-tone finish, IP64 rating, and practical features.
  2. Display: Vibrant 6.78-inch FHD+ AMOLED with 120Hz refresh rate.
  3. Performance: Smooth and responsive with minor frame drops, preloaded with bloatware.
  4. Battery: 5,110mAh with 45W fast charging.
  5. Cameras: Good daylight performance, average low-light, and sharp selfies.

Notable Quote: "The POCO M7 Pro 5G is a thoughtfully designed smartphone that punches above its weight."

Conclusion: A great budget-friendly device that doesn't skimp on essential features, with a minor downside of preloaded bloatware.

item.title: Redmi Turbo 4 To Feature MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC & 16GB RAM, Geekbench Listing Reveals - ABP Live
item.description:
Redmi Turbo 4 Revealed with MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC & 16GB RAM

Published on: 30 Dec 2024

Source: ABP Live

The upcoming Redmi Turbo 4 smartphone prototype has been listed on Geekbench, showcasing its potential features such as MediaTek's latest chipset and ample RAM.

  • Model number identified as 24129RT7CC on Geekbench.
  • Achievements: Single-core score of 1,649 and multi-core score of 6,342.
  • Expected to run on Android 15 and features an octa-core processor.
  • 14.96GB of RAM, likely marketed as 16GB.
  • Powering the device: MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra chipset with significant performance upgrades.
“The Turbo 4 would debut early next year as the first smartphone to feature the Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC.”

In conclusion, the Redmi Turbo 4 aims to improve upon its predecessor and is positioned for a launch early next year.

item.title: Redmi Turbo 4 aka Poco X7 Pro, world’s first Dimensity 8400 powered phone, to launch on January 2, 2025 - The Financial Express
item.description:
Xiaomi's Redmi Turbo 4: World's First Phone with MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Processor

Published on December 31, 2024, by Financial Express

Xiaomi's sub-brand Redmi is set to unveil the Redmi Turbo 4 on January 2, 2025, in China. This smartphone is of particular interest as it will be the first in the world to feature the new MediaTek Dimensity 8400 processor. The full design of the device has been revealed, showcasing a sporty, racecar-inspired look with a flat chassis and a plastic frame.

  • The Redmi Turbo 4 will sport a 6.67-inch LTPS OLED display with FHD+ resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • It will be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8400 processor, featuring an 8-core Cortex-A725 CPU with a maximum clock speed of 3.25GHz, Mali-G720 GPU, and Imagiq 1080 ISP.
  • The device will come with a 50-megapixel primary camera with optical image stabilization and a 6,550mAh battery with 90W charging.
  • Redmi has confirmed that the Turbo 4 will also launch globally as the Poco X7 Pro.
Redmi has revealed the full design of the Turbo 4 to build hype around the impending launch.

Follow FE Tech Bytes on Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Facebook for more updates.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 price leaked ahead of launch: Here’s what we know so far - CNBCTV18
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 price leaked ahead of launch: Here’s what we know so far

Date: Dec 30, 2024

Source: CNBC TV18

Apple’s upcoming iPhone SE 4, anticipated to launch in early 2025, is generating buzz due to recent price leaks suggesting a competitive pricing strategy aimed at undercutting its predecessor.

  • The expected launch price of the iPhone SE 4 could be around $500 or lower, according to leaks.
  • It may feature Apple's in-house 5G modem, potentially reducing manufacturing costs.
  • Anticipated specifications include a 6.1-inch OLED display, a 48MP rear camera, and a 24MP front camera.
  • The iPhone SE 4 is expected to adopt USB-C charging ports in compliance with EU regulations.
  • Powered by the A18 processor with 8GB of RAM, it aims to enhance performance and support advanced capabilities.
“This would be the first update to the iPhone SE model since 2022, when Apple added 5G capability to the device.”

The iPhone SE 4 aims to offer a combination of affordability and high-end features, appealing to users looking for a budget-friendly option with modern capabilities.
